Josh Merhar

About Me:

A 2014 graduate of Berklee College of Music, I'm currently a professional drummer and private drum teacher living in Boston, MA. While I love what I do, I'm looking to begin a career in web development. Aside from drumming in my bands, teaching, and learning programming, I enjoy solving Rubik's cubes and hanging out with my cat, Go-Gurt. Below are a few links to some of my favorite projects so far, as well as a link to my YouTube channel where I host over 120 drum lesson videos.

My YouTube Channel

Over 120 drum lesson videos covering a swath of topics. Made for intermediate and advanced drummers.

Battleship

An implementation of Battleship where a human faces off against the computer.

To-do List

A little app to help you keep track of all those things you need to do.

Calculator

Fancy math-doing machine with clickable buttons.

Tic-Tac-Toe

Tic-tac-toe for two human players that are real humans.

Etch-a-Sketch

Draw fantastic pixel images in any color you can conceive of.
